column2:
"Ah, <%me>.
I have been learning all about this wonderful Santa figure, and I have found myself greatly impressed by his generosity."
"I, too, would like to make the people of ARKS happy by giving them gifts! Our being here is a rare and precious thing, after all."
"I, too, would like to make the people of ARKS happy by giving them gifts! Our being here is a rare and precious thing, after all."
"Yes, I have been wondering about that myself. Harriet, have you no curiosity about how we were brought to this place?"
"Yes, I have been wondering about that myself. Harriet, have you no curiosity about how we were brought to this place?"
"...No, I care not. My only concern for now is making people happy, just as Santa did."
"...No, I care not. My only concern for now is making people happy, just as Santa did."
"Good grief... It seems my sister has become completely obsessed with Christmas. Very well, dear sister, I will yield."
"Good grief... It seems my sister has become completely obsessed with Christmas. Very well, dear sister, I will yield."
"Guardian, I would like to give gifts that could not have come from anyone else..."
"First, I wish to create a bracelet based on a Christmas wreath. Do you know where we might be able to procure suitable materials?"
